document.title: Hot Topic: Social Security Administration and Internal Revenue Service: State and Local Compliance Issues for 2000
document.abstract: Representatives from the Social Security Administration (SSA) and the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) conducted seminars across the state to clarify employee taxation and reporting issues with local government agencies before the end of the calendar year reporting, to minimize employer exposure to penalties for noncompliance. This Hot Topic summarizes those issues of utmost importance to cities.
